query:
query GetModelOptions($modelId: ID!) {
  model(id: $modelId) {
    id
    publication {
      options {
        ...PublicationOptions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    options {
      ...ModelOptions
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment PublicationOptions on ModelPublicationOptions {
  contactEmail
  contactName
  contactPhone
  modelName
  modelSummary
  presentedBy
  address
  externalUrl
  __typename
}

fragment ModelOptions on ModelOptions {
  backgroundColor
  defurnishViewEnabled
  dollhouseEnabled
  dollhouseLabelsEnabled
  floorSelectEnabled
  floorplanEnabled
  highlightReelEnabled
  labelsEnabled
  measurements
  roomBoundsEnabled
  socialSharingEnabled
  spaceSearchEnabled
  tourButtonsEnabled
  tourDollhousePanSpeed
  tourFastTransitionsEnabled
  tourPanAngle
  tourPanDirection
  tourPanSpeed
  tourTransitionSpeed
  tourTransitionTime
  tourZoomDuration
  unitType
  urlBrandingEnabled
  vrEnabled
  __typename
}
